Title: Relates to establishing a farm-to-school task force and requiring all public schools to provide fresh foods to students in a manner that supports local agriculture
Summary: Establishes a farm-to-school task force and directs the commissioner of education to develop a program to require all public schools to provide fresh foods to students in a manner that supports local agriculture.
LawCode: Amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L; amd ยง305, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a farm-to-school task force; and to amend the education law, in relation to requiring all public schools to provide fresh foods to students in a manner that supports local agriculture
